name: SpinDiver
description:
My first time doing a game jam, and I didn't have nearly as much time as I would have liked due to life responsibilities but I still got something playable out. 

Controls:

arrow keys to move
Z increase balance
X increase spin

The goal in spindiver is to knock out the enemy top with your own. Higher spin means doing more damage to the enemy, but it goes down on colliding. Balance stops damage from getting through on a hit and raising it protects you. However, you can't control your top and increase spin or balance at the same time! Choose wisely!
